Home

My name is Joshua Mandel. I am 27 years old and a current student at Ranken Technical College located in Saint Louis, MO. My focus is in the Application and Web Development program. I hope to have a job in the tech industry when I graduate. My hobbies include working out, rock climbing, reading, playing video games and watching Youtube and Twitch. I was born and raised in Saint Louis, MO however I have lived in other places including Avon and Steamboat Springs in Colorado. I also spent one year living abroad in Akko, Israel where I spent my time teaching and tutoring english in a local middle school and ran a few different after school programs. Shortly after that I hiked 300 miles of the Appalachian Trail from Southern Virginia to past Washington D.C. My next adventure that I am currently training for is the Missouri 340, a kayak race on the Missouri river that spans from Kansas City to Saint Louis.
